DF_ARCHITECT.ErrorColourSettingsMissing: DF Architect: 'lib - ColorSettings' module required. Please install and activate 'lib - ColorSettings'
DF_ARCHITECT.ErrorLibWrapperMissing: DF Architect: 'libWrapper' module required. Please install and activate 'libWrapper'.

General.ShowCounterHint: Display object counters on the tiles, walls, lighting, and sounds layers

ReloadRequired.Title: Reload Required
ReloadRequired.Content: A reload is required for your changes to go into effect.

LayerShortcuts.Settings.Description: Shortcuts for switching between the canvas layers.

QuickSwap.Title: Layer Quick Swap
QuickSwap.Info: This Hotkey is for quickly swapping between two preset layers. Each time it is pressed, it will switch to the layer it is not on. If you are on a layer that is not included in this pair, you will be switched to Layer 1.
QuickSwap.Layer1_Hint: One of the two layers that will swap between when the Quick Swap hotkey is pressed.
QuickSwap.Layer2_Hint: The second of the two layers that will swap between when the Quick Swap hotkey is pressed.

WallShortcuts.Settings.Description: Hotkeys assigned to switch between the different wall types
WallShortcuts.Settings.ToggleForceSnapHint: Toggles the Force Snap to Grid option on the walls layer.

Setting.EnabledHint: Show the toggle button for enabling alternate grid snapping to the center of boxes instead of corners.
Setting.PlaceOnControlBarHint: Place the Alternate Grid Snap Toggle button on the main Controls Bar instead of the Tools bars.

WallJoinSplit.Split_Label: Split the selected walls into two walls each
WallJoinSplit.Join_Label: Merge the selected line of walls into a single wall

WallGapFiller.SettingHint: The maximum distance two wall endpoints need to be for them to be joined by the Wall Gap Filler feature
WallGapFiller.GapsDetected: {count} gaps were detected. Do you wish to close them?

WallChangeType.Setting.MetaKeyHint: Which key would you like to hold down when clicking a wall type control to change the current selection of walls to that wall type?

WallAltDrop.Setting.DistanceHint: The pixel distance a wall endpoint needs to be to auto-snap the currently dragging wall endpoint to that same position.

WallDirections.Setting.AllowUnselectedInvertName: Allow Orientation Invert on Unselected Walls
WallDirections.Setting.AllowUnselectedInvertHint: Allow the use of a double right-click to invert a wall's orientation when the wall has not first been selected.

AltLightOrigin.Settings.Colour1_Hint: The colour of the crosshairs that display when you hold Shift while moving a light source.
AltLightOrigin.Settings.Colour2_Hint: The alternate colour of the crosshairs that display when you hold Shift+Alt while moving a light source.

QuickColourPicker.EyeDrop_Title: Pick a colour from the map

Setting.AllowPC_Hint: Allow players to capture the current game board canvas.

ScreenCapture.ErrorStitchingFailure: Failed to complete image stitching process due to hitting memory limit. You can try again but you may need to make the scene smaller.
ScreenCapture.Label: Save Game Board Image
ScreenCapture.Target: What portion would you like to capture?
ScreenCapture.Compression: The quality level for JPEG and WebP
ScreenCapture.WarningNoScene: There is no scene being viewed. Please view or activate a scene for canvas capture.
ScreenCapture.WarningConfirmContent:
You are attempting to capture a very large image. The browser window MUST NOT be adjusted once the process has started.

It is not recommended to render anything over 8000px by 8000px as this may lead to stitching failures due to memory limits.

CaptureGameScreen.ErrorCaptureInProgress: A capture session is already in progress. Please complete or cancel it before trying again.

Delete.Title: Delete Light Template:
Delete.Confirm: Are you sure you wish to delete this light template?

AltLightInverted.InvertLuminosityButton: Invert luminosity to Light and Dark (positive/negative values)

TileFlattener.Label: Flatten Tiles into Single Image
TileFlattener.RenderLighting: Bake-In Lighting (background will not be transparent)
TileFlattener.HideAnimatedTiles: Hide Animated Tiles (Render Hidden Tiles must be OFF)
TileFlattener.Margin: Additional padding to be rendered outside of Selected Tiles

SceneReplaceDialog.Title: Scene Replacement
SceneReplaceDialog.WhatToDo: Would you like Tile Flattener to do any of these processes for you?
SceneReplaceDialog.ReplaceBackgroundHint: The current scene's background will be changed to the newly created image.
SceneReplaceDialog.CloneScene: Clone the current scene and use image as background
SceneReplaceDialog.CloneSceneHint: Clones the current scene and its content and sets the new scene's background to the newly created image.
SceneReplaceDialog.ImportToScene: Import as a new tile in current Scene
SceneReplaceDialog.ImportToSceneHint: Import the new image as a tile into the center of the current scene.

ShowLayerControls.Lights: Display Light boundaries on other layers
ShowLayerControls.Sounds: Display Sound boundaries on other layers

TileConfigExt.SettingControlsName: Tile Config: Show Controls for Animations
TileConfigExt.SettingControlsHint: Display playback controls for animations in the tile config thumbnail
